name: Mars isn´t THAT far
description:
Move with A/D and dodge with S

You have to defeat the evil aliens while you dash away from their lasers and kamikaze ships. 

Let´s see how much points you can make!

Made on 6 days on the summer of 2021. 

I would love to continue improving the game, but unity doesn´t take kindly games from old versions, so i can´t keep working on it :,(

Hope you can enjoy it nonetheless and comment your Highscore!
